sentences.sContent: All the country's political parties have accepted that it is time to revamp the system.
sentences.sCn: 这个国家的所有政党都认可现在是改革这一体制的时候了。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + vamp(修补) → 修订

trans.tranCn: 重组； 修订， 修改
trans.tranOther: If someone revamps something, they make changes to it in order to try and improve it
